text: (manitarkale!) Vanankalilum pumiyilum ullavarrai niccayamaka allah unkalukku vacappatuttit tantirukkiran enpataiyum, avan tan arut kotaikalai maraivakavum velippataiyakavum unkal mitu corintirukkiran enpataiyum ninkal parkkavillaiya? (Ivvarellamiruntum) manitarkalil palar oru kalviyum, (tarkka ritiyana) valikattalum, telivana veta nulin ataramuminri allahvaip parri (vinakat) tarkkikkinranar
